panels.description: The number of active sessions or in other words the number of sessions within the first two short term containers.
panels.title: Active

panels.description: The number of sessions in the short term containers.
panels.title: Short Term

panels.description: The number of sessions in the long term containers.
panels.title: Long Term

panels.description: Consumed memory of stored sessions held by this node in.
panels.title: Consumed memory

panels.description: Number of stored sessions held by this node.
panels.title: Stored sessions

targets.expr: sum without (instance, type, class, pool, service) (rate(appsuite_mysql_connections_timeout_total[1m])) / sum without (instance, type, class, pool, service) (rate(appsuite_mysql_connections_total[1m]))

panels.description: The total number of pooled and active connections of this db pool.
panels.title: ConfigDB Read Connections

targets.expr: sum without (instance, status, host) (rate(appsuite_imap_commands_seconds_count{status!~"OK"}[1m])) / sum without (instance, status, host) (rate(appsuite_imap_commands_seconds_count[1m]))

panels.description: The number of times an execution was denied because the circuit was open.
panels.title: Denial Rate: $circuitbreaker_name

panels.description: The number of times the circuit was opened.
panels.title: Open Rate: $circuitbreaker_name
